## OWebDate.describe() method

Returns date description object.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
describe(): {
        format: string;
        nSeconds: number;
        nMinutes: number;
        nHours: number;
        nDays: number;
        nWeeks: number;
        nMonths: number;
        nYears: number;
        inPast: boolean;
        cDays: number;
        cHours: number;
        cMinutes: number;
        cSeconds: number;
        D: string;
        L: string;
        l: number;
        ll: number;
        d: number;
        M: string;
        F: string;
        m: number;
        mm: string;
        Y: number;
        y: number;
        h: number;
        hh: string;
        H: number;
        i: number;
        ii: string;
        s: number;
        ss: string;
        ms: number;
        a: string;
        A: string;
    };
```
<b>Returns:</b>

{ format: string; nSeconds: number; nMinutes: number; nHours: number; nDays: number; nWeeks: number; nMonths: number; nYears: number; inPast: boolean; cDays: number; cHours: number; cMinutes: number; cSeconds: number; D: string; L: string; l: number; ll: number; d: number; M: string; F: string; m: number; mm: string; Y: number; y: number; h: number; hh: string; H: number; i: number; ii: string; s: number; ss: string; ms: number; a: string; A: string; }
